title: sAgara kanyakA
sahitya:
sAgara kanyakA ninnu mrokkiti bhAgyadAyikA


anupallavi

  vEga nannu samayamu vAgIsha janani dikku nIvamma


caraNam 1    kamalamukhi sumukhi kara kalita padma kanja nayana suradana 
vimala hrdaya vishvamaya kanci varaduni komma pErundEvamma
    caraNam 2    ghana sama vENi kanakamaya kumbhastani sumanAsikE rasikE 
vanaja nayana yugaLE kambugaLE mrgamada tilakAnkita phAlE
    caraNam 3    svarNamaya shubhra vasanE sakalAbharaNa bhUSitE bhakta 
sankaTa shamanE sadAshiva kavi sannuta suguNE nityakalyANi
